# Set Up
```{r}
#| echo: true
library(tidyverse)
library(tidybiology)
data(happy)
data(happy_join_one)
data(happy_full)
```

# Question 1
Take a look at the three data frames:
`happy`, `happy_join_one` & `happy_full`

# 1: View `happy`
```{r}
#| echo: true
glimpse(happy)
```

# 2: View `happy_join_one`
```{r}
#| echo: true
glimpse(happy_join_one)
```

# 3: View `happy_full`
```{r}
#| echo: true
glimpse(happy_full)
```

# Question 2
Combine `happy` and `happy_join_one` by row.
```{r}
#| echo: true
bind_rows(happy, happy_join_one)
```

# Question 3
Combine `happy` and `happy_join_one` by column.
```{r}
#| echo: true
bind_cols(happy, happy_join_one)
```
